T04sanss04u:6: r mūlâpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrddhâbhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvâvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayati |
T04sanss04u:10: yaḥ kulaputra mūrddhâbhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastv apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā |
T04sanss04u:13: yaḥ punar dharmaṃ pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratyekabuddhaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayatîyaṃ dvitīyā mūlâpattiḥ ||
T04sanss04u:14: yaḥ punar mām uddiśya śirastuṇḍamuṇḍakāṣāyavastraprāvṛtaḥ śikṣādhārī vā śi-
T04sanss04u:16: kṣâdhārī vā tasya duḥśīlasya vā śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy apaharati apaharāyati |
T04sanss04u:17: gṛhasthaṃ vā karoti kāye daṇḍaiḥ praharati cārake vā prakṣipati jīvitena vā viyojayatîyaṃ tṛtīyā mūlâpattiḥ ||
T04sanss04u:18: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati pitaram arhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ vā jīvitād vyaparopayati samagraṃ vā saṃghaṃ bhinatti tathāgatasyârhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saṃcintya duṣṭacitto rudhiram utpādayati ||
T04sanss04u:19: ebhiḥ pañcabhir ānantaryair karmabhir anyatarânyataraṃ karmôtpādayatîyaṃ
T04sanss04u:22: daśâkuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate 'nyāṃś ca bahūn
T04sanss04u:23: satvān daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayatîyaṃ pañcamī mūlâpattiḥ ||
T04sanss04u:25: yaḥ punar grāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrabhedaṃ karotîyaṃ
T04sanss04u:31: yābhir mūlâpattibhiḥ skhalitâdikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvâvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni
T04sanss04u:33: vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ |
T04sanss04u:35: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunâsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityêdaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti |
T04sanss04u:38: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvêdaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrântaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti |
T04sanss04u:39: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇâgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti |
T04sanss04u:40: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvantôttrasyanti
T04sanss04u:46: yayā mūlâpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvâvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati |
T04sanss04u:49: tasmād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena parapudgalānām āśayânuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathâśayānāṃ satvānām anupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyā |
T04sanss04u:52: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva
T04sanss04u:55: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ |
T04sanss04u:56: na tvaṃ śakyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ |
T04sanss04u:57: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam utpādaya |
T04sanss04u:59: yāvad yathāpūrvôktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvit-yā
T04sanss04u:61: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati |
T04sanss04u:63: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayasva |
T04sanss04u:65: yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ |
T04sanss04u:66: yāvad yathāpūrvôktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā mūlâpattiḥ ||
T04sanss04u:67: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatvâivaṃ vakṣyati |
T04sanss04u:69: mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata |
T04sanss04u:71: na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha |
T04sanss04u:72: na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśântaṃ kartuṃ |
T04sanss04u:74: śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ côpadiśata |
T04sanss04u:77: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantîdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam upagṛhṇīyuḥ |
T04sanss04u:78: ubhayor api mūlâpatir bhavatîyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya
T04sanss04u:80: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā nidarśayanti |
T04sanss04u:81: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokârthaṃ lŌübhasatkŌürahetoḥ paṭhanti
T04sanss04u:89: te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ câvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti |
T04sanss04u:91: atas te īrṣyahetunā côttarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti |
T04sanss04u:92: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayâpāyagāmino bhavanti |
T04sanss04u:93: yathā kaścit puruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gacched gantuṃ nāvā samudram avatarate sa mahāsamudre svayam eva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt tatrâiva maraṇaṃ nigacched |
T04sanss04u:94: evam eva ye ādikarmikā bodhisatvā mahāguṇasāgaram avatartukāmêrṣyāhetos tad vadanti |
T04sanss04u:95: tatpratyayāt te śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpnuvanti |
T04sanss04u:96: evaṃ te bālâdikarmikā bodhisatvêrṣyāhetor anṛtapratyayā mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante |
T04sanss04u:99: gṛhasthapravrajitâdikarmikā bodhisatvā ye te gambhīrāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrântâdhāraṇīkṣāntisamādhibhūmisvalaṃkṛtamahāvidvatpuruṣāṇāṃ kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ gocarās tān mahāyānasūtrântān dhārayanti
T04sanss04u:100: paṭhanti svâdhyāyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa vācayitvā prakāśayanti |
T04sanss04u:101: ahaṃ cêmān dharmān svabuddhyā buddhvâivaṃ ca punar ahaṃ kāruṇyahetos
T04sanss04u:103: tvayā vā punas tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvam atra gambhīreṣu
T04sanss04u:107: evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama |
T04sanss04u:108: etarhi na punar eva dadāti paṭhitamātreṇâham imān evaṃrūpān dharmān gambhīragambhīrān upadiśāmi na sākṣātkriyayā ||
T04sanss04u:110: tatpratyayāt sarvatryadhvagatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānām āryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sâparādhiko bhavati |
T04sanss04u:118: tad yathā kaścit puruṣo mahâṭavīṃ prasthitaḥ kṣuttarṣaprapīḍitaḥ sa tatra mahāphalavṛkṣe pratiṣṭhitaḥ
T04sanss04u:120: anāsvādya viṣavṛkṣam abhiruhya viṣaphalāni bhuñjīta bhuktvā ca kālaṃ kuryāt |
T04sanss04u:122: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ sanniśritya mahāyānam avatartukāmā lābhasatkārayaśohetor ātmānam upadarśayanti parān paṃsayanti evaṃrūpāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayā gurukayâpattyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti |
T04sanss04u:123: apāyagāminas tathārūpāś ca pudgalā na sevanīyāḥ sarvakṣatriyabrāhmaṇaviṭśūdrāṇāṃ |
T04sanss04u:124: yaś ca tān sevate sa sâtisāro bhavati sarvavijñānāṃ |
T04sanss04u:127: kṣatriyāṇāṃ purohitacaṇḍālâmātyacaṇḍālā bhaṭacaṇḍālā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamānino mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ
T04sanss04u:130: ṣu saṃdṛśyante te tyāgamadamattā mānamadadarpeṇa kṣatriyaṃ vibhedayanti |
T04sanss04u:134: tenôpadraveṇa te bhikṣavaḥ paudgalikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā
T04sanss04u:135: cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā staupikaṃ vā śramaṇair apahṛtya teṣāṃ prāhṛtaṃ pradāpyante |
T04sanss04u:138: ye kṣatriyacaṇḍālāḥ śramaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ praduṣyanti tathārūpaṃ ca te dharmaṃ prajñapayiṣyanti
T04sanss04u:149: tena ca hetunā bhikṣūṇām apy upaśāntāḥ kleśā nôpaśamyanti
T04sanss04u:151: tatkāle punas te bhikṣavâśayavipannā bhavanti śīlavipannāś ca bhavanti |
T04sanss04u:152: ācāravipannā bhavanti dṛṣṭivipannā bhavanti taddhetoḥ śaithilikā bhavanti |
T04sanss04u:156: te bhūyasyā mātrayā saparicārasya kṣatriyasya satkṛtā bhavanti mānitāḥ pūjitā bhavanti |
T04sanss04u:157: te ca prahāṇâbhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhastheṣv avarṇaṃ niścārayanti |
T04sanss04u:158: sa ca kṣatriyaḥ saparivāraḥ prahāṇâbhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇām
T04sanss04u:161: yas tatra prahāṇikānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upabhogaparibhogas taṃ svâdhyāyâbhiratānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ niryātayanti
T04sanss04u:173: yadi te bodhisatvâkāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasya nāma śrutvā darśanam asyâkāṅkṣeran |
T04sanss04u:175: yadi te ākāśagarbhaṃ bodhisatvaṃ namaskuryuḥ nāma câsya parikīrttayeyus teṣāṃ sa kulaputro yathā bhāgyatayā svarūpeṇâgratas tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yāvad dārikārūpeṇa purataḥ
T04sanss04u:177: tasyâdikarmikasya bodhisatvasya yathā samutthitās tâpattīḥ pratideśayati |
T04sanss04u:184: yadi teṣāṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ na dadāti |
T04sanss04u:186: tenâdikarmikeṇa bodhisatvena sâparādhena paścime yāme utthāyâsanāt prāṅmukhena sthitvā dhūpaṃ dhūpayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss04u:189: aruṇâruṇa mahākṛpa mahābhāga mahôditas tvaṃ jambudvīpe
T04sanss04u:191: śīghram ākāśagarbhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ mama vacanena bodhaya |
T04sanss04u:193: mama svapnântare tam upāyam upadarśaya yenâham upāyenâpattiṃ pratideśayāmi |
T04sanss04u:195: tena tatkālaṃ śayyāyāṃ nidrāpayitavyaṃ sahôdgate 'ruṇe iha jambudvīpe ākāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasyêha samāgamo bhavati
T04sanss04u:197: tasyâdikarmikasya bodhisatvasya svapnântare purataḥ sthitvā tāṃ mūlâpattiṃ deśayati mahāyānôpāyena
T04sanss04u:200: bodhicittâsaṃpramoṣaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sudṛḍhavyavasthitaś ca bhavati mahāyānae ity ādi ||
T04sanss04u:201: atha vā yo 'tra sūtre 'dhyeṣaṇamantraḥ pūrvam uktaḥ |
T04sanss04u:204: araṇye upavane 'bhyavakāśe vāgaraṃ vā tagaraṃ vā kālânusāri
T04sanss04u:206: prāñjalinā ca bhūtvā samantato digvidikṣu ca pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditvême mantrapadāḥ pravartayitavyāḥ
T04sanss04u:215: murara vegadhāri namucame bhujayata kāruṇika cintāmaṇi pūraya kāruṇika sarvâśāṃ me sthāpaya
T04sanss04u:226: yadi kṣatriyâdayo 'pi bodhisatvāḥ katham eṣām āpattiniyamo 'nyeṣāṃ
T04sanss04u:234: ṣāṃ yatra bahulaṃ saṃbhavaḥ te tatrâkoṭitāḥ svanāmagrahaṇadarśanād bhayôtpādanârthaṃ |
T04sanss04u:236: yena vā prakṛtimahāsâvadyatayâsamādāno 'py abhavyo bhavaty ucchinnakuśalamūlaś ca sutarāṃ tena sāmvarikêty alam
T04sanss04u:239: kiṃ vâpi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ prātimokṣaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ kalpaśatasahasram api mūlaphalabhakṣaḥ syāt |
T04sanss04u:241: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair vihared iyaṃ bodhisatvasya gurukā mūlâpattiḥ |
T04sanss04u:242: tad yathā kulaputra śrāvakayānīyo mūlâpattim āpannaḥ so 'bhavyas tair eva skandhaiḥ parinirvātum
T04sanss04u:243: evam eva kulaputro 'pratideśyâitām āpattim aniḥsṛjya tān
T04sanss04u:245: āsāṃ ca mūlâpattīnāṃ sukhagrahaṇadhāraṇârtham ekīyamatānāṃ ca saṃgrahakārikôcyante ||
T04sanss04u:262: daṇḍāpayed vā śramaṇān dadyād vā śaraṇatrayāt ||
T04sanss04u:263: gṛhṇīyād dīyamānaṃ vā śamathe tyājanāt punaḥ |
T04sanss04u:273: yo mahābrahman mamôddiśya pravrajito duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣu-
T04sanss04u:275: r anubhūtaḥ kaśambakajāto 'śramaṇaḥ śramaṇapratijñaḥ abrahmacārī brahmacāripratijñaḥ |
T04sanss04u:277: atha ca punaḥ sa duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur adyâpi sarvadevānāṃ yāvat sarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ yāvat puṇyanidhīnāṃ darśayitā bhavati kalyāṇamitraṃ |
T04sanss04u:278: kiṃ câpi sâpātrībhūtaḥ tena ca punaḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍena kāṣāyavastraprāvaraṇêryāpathena darśanahetunâpi bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ vividhakuśalamūlôpastambhanakaraḥ
T04sanss04u:280: tasmād yo mamôddiśya pravrajitaḥ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā tasya
T04sanss04u:281: nânujānāmi cakravarttir ājñām api yan mamôddiśya
T04sanss04u:282: pravrajitasya sahadharmeṇâpi kāye daṇḍaprahāraṃ vā dātuṃ cārake vā prakṣeptuṃ |
T04sanss04u:283: aṅgam aṅgaṃ vikarttanaṃ vā kartuṃ jīvitād vā vyaparopaṇaṃ kartuṃ-
T04sanss04u:287: atha ca punaḥ sa pudgalo gorocanakastūrikāsadṛśêti |
T04sanss04u:289: ye mamôddiśya pravrajitān yānabhūtān pātrabhūtān vā viheṭhayiṣyanti te sarveṣāṃ tryadhvagatānāṃ buddhānām atīva sâparādhā bhavanti |
T04sanss04u:295: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahūni śrāvakaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni ca bodhisatvaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato 'ntike evaṃrūpaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karmâvaraṇaṃ pratideśayanti |
T04sanss04u:296: vayam api bhadanta bhagavan bahūnāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pravacane pātrabhūtān pātrabhūtāṃś ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakayānīyān pudgalāñ jugupsitavantaḥ paṃsitavanto roṣitavanto 'varṇâyaśaḥkathāś ca niścāritavantaḥ |
T04sanss04u:297: tena vayaṃ karmâvaraṇena triṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ
T04sanss04u:302: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān vacanais tarjitavantaḥ paribhāṣitavantaḥ |
T04sanss04u:304: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān apātrabhūtān patrâbhūtāṃś ca praharitavantaḥ |
T04sanss04u:310: vayaṃ bhagavantam uddiśya pravrajitān gṛhasthān kāritavantaḥ
T04sanss04u:314: asmābhir bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakâpatrabhūtāḥ pātrabhūtāś ca sâparādhikāś cārake prakṣiptās tena vayaṃ karmâvaraṇena bahūn kalpāṃs tṛṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tī-
T04sanss04u:324: caturbhir mahānāman dharmaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhī akṣaṇaprāpto bhavati |
T04sanss04u:325: jātyandhaś ca jaḍaś câjihvakaś ca caṇḍālaś ca jātu sukhito bhavaty abhyākhyānabahulaś ca ṣaṇḍakaś ca paṇḍakaś ca
T04sanss04u:327: strī ca bhavati śvā ca śūkaraś ca gardabhaś côṣṭraś ca āśīviṣaś ca bhavati tatra tatra jātau
T04sanss04u:329: iha mahānāman gṛhī pūrvajinakrṭâdhikārāṇāṃ satvānāṃ naiṣkramyacittasya pravrajyācittasyâryamārgacittasyântarāyaṃ karoti |
T04sanss04u:331: punar aparaṃ gṛhī dhanalaulyena putralaulyena karmavipākam aśraddadhat putrasya vā duhitur vā bhāryāyā vā jñātisaṃghasyâiśvaryasthāne vartamāne pravrajyântarāyaṃ karoti |
T04sanss04u:342: na dahyante saṃhṛṣṭatarāś ca nārakeyāṇāṃ kapālaṃ bhittvā rudhiraṃ pibanti |
T04sanss04u:343: kapālântaracarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye mastakaṃ bhittvā jvalitamastakaluṅgān pibanti |
T04sanss04u:344: jihvâmiṣabhujo nāma pakṣiṇo ye jihvāṃ vidāryâbhito 'bhitaḥ prabhakṣayanti
T04sanss04u:345: sâpi jihvā bhuktā punar api saṃjāyate padmadalakomalatarā |
T04sanss04u:354: marmaguhyakā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sarvāṇi marmavivarāṇi bhittvā marmāṇi kṛntayitvā vivarāṇi praviśya majjāmaṇḍaṃ pibanti krandamānānāṃ |
T04sanss04u:355: sūcīchidrā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sūcīsadṛśatuṇḍā raktaṃ pibanti |
T04sanss04u:358: keśôṇḍukā nāma pakṣiṇo ye keśamūlāny utpāṭayanti ||
T04sanss04u:359: sâivam avīcipradeśas trīṇi yojanaśatasahasrāṇi pakṣibhairavapakṣo nāma |
T04sanss04u:360: tatra tair anyair nārakeyaiḥ sahânekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bhakṣyate saṃbhavati ca |
T04sanss04u:361: sa kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ sarvasmād duṣkhajālaparivṛtaḥ |
T04sanss04u:362: śvabhraprapāto nāma dvitīyaḥ pradeśas tatra gacchati |

T04sanss04u:365: abhiprapannas taṃ śvabhraprapātaṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati |

T04sanss04u:381: pratyekaṃ sarvâṅgāni pramathnanto dahanti pādatale câsya śaṅkubhir bhidyete |
T04sanss04u:384: bhukto bhuktaḥ punar api saṃjāyate sukumārataraḥ |

T04sanss04u:392: sâivaṃ mohitaḥ pāpakārī prajvalitâṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā taddraviṇam anudhāvati |

T04sanss04u:400: vitathadarśanaṃ nāma tatra karmakṛtāṃ striyaṃ paśyati yā tena pūrvaṃ naṣṭasmṛtinā dṛṣṭā |

T04sanss04u:405: gṛhītvā câuṣṭhāt prabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathâsya sarṣapaphalamātrapramāṇam api nâvaśiṣṭaṃ
T04sanss04u:409: sa kaṭukāṃ kharāṃ vedanām anubhavaṃs tasmād rāgâgner na nivartate |
T04sanss04u:410: yena tā striyas tena bhūyaḥ saḥ saṃdhāvati |

T04sanss04u:425: sā ca jihvā karmavaśāt pañcayojanaśatapramāṇā bhavati |

T04sanss04u:452: sā ca jihvā chinnā punar api saṃjāyate karmavaśāt |

T04sanss04u:488: etebhyo bhayabhīto yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate |

T04sanss04u:513: tasyāṃ nadyāṃ yāny asthīni te pāṣāṇāḥ |

T04sanss04u:521: evaṃ śiśubhiḥ saha vipratipatteḥ kṣāranadyām uhyamānān dārakān paśyati |
T04sanss04u:525: evaṃ govaḍavâjâiḍakâdiṣu prakṛtisâvadyaḥ kāmamithyâcāraḥ kharataravipākaḥ paṭhyate |
T04sanss04u:526: tāsām eva govaḍavâdīnāṃ taptâyomayīnāṃ akuśalanirmitānāṃ yonimārgeṇa sa tiryakkāmasevī praviśati
T04sanss04u:529: m udare pradīptâṅgāranikaraparipūrṇe svidyate pacyate bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇîti vistareṇa draṣṭavyaṃ ||
T04sanss04u:530: evam anyanāśitāsv api bhikṣuṇīṣu vipratipannānāṃ mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante |
T04sanss04u:532: evaṃ prasahyânītāsv api parastrīṣu labdhāsu ca kanyāsu |

T04sanss04u:536: sa nêhâiva mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ dvayaṃ samāpadyate 'pi tu mātṛgrāmaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ nidhyāyan paśyati |

T04sanss04u:547: yataś câite kāmâivaṃ smaraṇaprārthanāviṣayam api gatâivam anarthakarās tenâiva kāmâpavādakasūtre 'bhihitam |

T04sanss04u:558: rogo bhikṣavaḥ kāmā gaṇḍaḥ śalyamadyamadyamūlam āmiṣavaḍisaṃ mṛtyur anityāḥ kāmās tucchāḥ
T04sanss04u:562: yathā mṛgāṇāṃ bandhanāya kūṭaṃ dvijānāṃ bandhanāya jālaṃ |

T04sanss04u:574: duṣkhaṃ tīvraṃ kharaṃ kaṭukam anubhūtaṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ pragharitaṃ yac caturṣu mahāsamudreṣûdakāt prabhūtataraṃ ||
T04sanss04u:577: asthisaṃghātaḥ snāyusaṃbaddho māṃsenânuliptaḥ carmaṇā paryavanaddhaḥ chavyā praticchannaḥ chidravicchidraḥ kṛmisaṃghaniṣevitaḥ satvānām anarthakaḥ kleśakarmaṇāṃ vastu ||
